level.heading: Evidentiary effect; basis for civil liability.
level.text: Neither a violation of this chapter nor compliance herewith shall constitute any evidence of negligence or contributory negligence, nor shall either a violation or compliance provide any basis for a civil action for damages.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-194
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-194, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 50-1701.
